full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MDO SNGAGS MTHA' DAG GI LAM GYI SROG SHING BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021B (ZHES MDO SNGAGS MTHA' DAG GI LAM GYI SROG SHING BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ^BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB MING CAN GYIS RANG DANG RANG GI SLOB MA RNAMS KYI KHA DON DU MA 'CHAG PAR BYA BA'I CHED DU, 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS SKOR DANG BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DNGOS GRUB BANG MDZAD SOGS LAS GZHIR BYAS TE SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG @022A *, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
